name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.help
script:
inputs:
  text/topic:
    type: freeform
    required@bool: yes

start:
  decision:
    outcome/editor:
      if@bool: {{inputs.topic == 'editor'}}
      then:
        await:
          form:
            title: Help: Automation Editor
            elements:
              say/markdown:
                content@text:
                  ## Documentation
                  See: <https://cerb.ai/docs/automations/>
    outcome/input:
      if@bool: {{inputs.topic == 'input'}}
      then:
        await:
          form:
            title: Help: Automation Input
            elements:
              say/markdown:
                content@text:
                  ## Documentation
                  See: <https://cerb.ai/docs/automations/#inputs>

    outcome/output:
      if@bool: {{inputs.topic == 'output'}}
      then:
        await:
          form:
            title: Help: Automation Output
            elements:
              say/markdown:
                content@text:
                  ## Documentation
                  See: <https://cerb.ai/docs/automations/#dictionaries>
    
    outcome/policy:
      if@bool: {{inputs.topic == 'policy'}}
      then:
        await:
          form:
            title: Help: Automation Policies
            elements:
              say/markdown:
                content@text:
                  ## Documentation
                  See: <https://cerb.ai/docs/automations/#policies>
